description.ruby-sapphire:
Reduces the polygon count
and raises ATTACK.
description.emerald:
Reduces the polygon count
and raises ATTACK.
description.gold-silver:
A move that raises
the user's ATTACK.
description.crystal:
A move that raises
the user's ATTACK.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user reduces
its polygon count
to sharpen edges
and raise ATTACK.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user reduces its
polygon count to
make itself more
jagged, raising the
Attack stat.
description.platinum:
The user reduces its
polygon count to
make itself more

Attack stat.

polygon count to

The user reduces its polygon count to
make itself more jagged, raising the

description.black-2-white-2:
The user reduces its polygon count to
make itself more jagged, raising the

description.x-y:

description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user lowers its polygon count to

description.sun-moon:
The user makes its edges more jagged, 
which raises its Attack stat.

The user makes its edges more jagged,

which raises its Attack stat.
description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.
